Subject: Unable to deliver reports ||UBI Financial Services||
Description: Ourclient, UBI Services, want to forward daily CAP reports to the email IDs, but SMTP settings are not generating test mails after configuring the same.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1. Setup SMTP option
2. Save the setting with the option to send a test email.
3. Customer received a bounceback because the ID din not match the from address.
What_We_Know__c: Customer received a bounceback because the ID din not match the from address.
Solution_Comment__c: In the custom email setting we copied the user id/email and the test email was sent successfully.
